DOC.brief_summary: This is an open label study of subjects who have failed Protocol PGN-1300. Adult subjects (greater than 18 years old) who present with a mildly infected diabetic foot ulcer (IDSA criteria) having full thickness (i.e., through the dermis but not involving joint capsule, tendon, and bone) and have failed PGN-1300. Subjects must also provide informed consent and meet all other entry criteria to be enrolled and receive PluroGel PN.
DOC.brief_title: Topical PluroGel PN for the Treatment of Mildly Infected Diabetic Foot Ulcers
DOC.criteria: Subjects who have failed treatment on Protocol PGN1300X
